details:
noun
- the act of distracting
= example: the act of distracting
= synonyms: misdirection
- an entertainment that provokes pleased interest and distracts you from worries and vexations
= example: an entertainment that provokes pleased interest and distracts you from worries and vexations
= synonyms: beguilement
- mental turmoil
= example: mental turmoil
- an obstacle to attention
= example: an obstacle to attention
